Reviews.Title: LG Digital Zoom CCTV camera
Reviews.Author: Jerry Jones
Reviews.Content: Camera is OK, but not great.It is relatively easy to setup, but I washoping for a better picture at night.

ProductInfo.Features:
650TVL Color Exview HAD CCD II with LG XDI-V processor
Super low LUX: 0.000001Lux(B/W) @ Sens-up x512
ICR Day & Night with 2D+3D DNR
C/CS Mount; Lens not included
RS-485 and Coaxial Communication; DC12V/AC24V
ProductInfo.Name: LG LCB5300 650TVL Color XDI-V Day/Night 16x Digital Zoom Dual Voltage Box Camera with ICR, Lens not included (Silver Gray)
